findings.title: Position Closing Error
findings.description: When closing a position, an unknown error can occur, causing the system to fail to pay.

findings.title: Potential Unauthorized Script Upgrade
findings.description: The contracts have external functions that can modify state and are accessible by onlyOwner or onlyMaster, which may lead to potential unauthorized script upgrades.

findings.title: System Cannot Pay Error
findings.description: The system cannot pay due to an unknown error when closing a position, which can cause the system to fail to pay.
